item.title: About
item.description: Energetic accomplished results-oriented with a passion for unleashing the priceless insights that data conceal by applying the latest efficient tools. Dedicated to perpetual professional growth in the field of data analytics. Profound knowledge of data visualization principles and problem-solving abilities. Seeking to continue enhancing my technical and soft skills and achieve professional development in a motivating, and supportive working environment. Education Masters of Science in Business Analytics, class of August 2022, Olayan School of Business, American University of Beirut.

item.title: Sales Dashboard Using Power BI
item.description: Overview: In order to analyze the sales of an international retail company, the following dashboards were created using Microsoft Power BI: Annual Sales Report Customer Geography Analytics Report Since we wanted to analyze the performance of the Sales Department Employees, a Sales Performance Dashboard was created. Dashboards: Customers Geography Analytics Dashboard Annual Sales Dashboard Sales Department Performance Dashboard <!DOCTYPE html> Go to Project

item.title: Sales Dashboard Using QlikSense
item.description: Overview: In order to analyze the sales of an international retail company, the following dashboards were created using QlikSense: Annual Sales Report Customer Geography Analytics Report Since we wanted to analyze the performance of the Sales Department Employees, a Sales Performance Dashboard was created. Dashboards: Customers Geography Analytics Dashboard Annual Sales Dashboard Sales Department Performance Dashboard Data Model Viewer of the Qlik Sense Project using Star Schema.

item.title: Sales Dashboard Using Streamlit
item.description: Overview: A Sales Dashboard Web Application created using Streamlit Python library. It displays the following dashboards International Sales Analytics Dashboard International Profit Analytics Dashboard USA Sales Analytics Dashboard USA Profit Analytics Dashboard Clustering Transactions per Discount, Sales and Profit Images Customers Geography Analytics Dashboard <!DOCTYPE html> Go to Project
